description: Ensures that Windows Defender Firewall is enabled and properly configured across all profiles (Domain, Private, and Public). Automatically enables firewall, logging for allowed and blocked connections, and sets default log paths when missing.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating script log for human-readable execution traces.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Path where the active response JSON result will be stored. Uses overwrite-safe NDJSON logging.

enforced_policies: Firewall is enabled for Domain, Private, and Public profiles
Logging of allowed connections is enabled
Logging of blocked connections is enabled
Log file path is set to default if missing
